title: description
Jason Derulo's Want To Want Variation: A high variant of the Hawaiian Variation. As bad as Jason Derulo's time.

title: notes
Jason Derulo's Want To Want Variation: Gin, Juice and a dash of yours.

title: pairing
Jason Derulo's Want To Want Variation: Jason Derulo has it with a high AMERICAN COFFEE and cronut.

title: serving_suggestion
Jason Derulo's Want To Want Variation: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the bad sounds of Want To Want Me.
